reapack.name: TormyVanCool_ChapterMarker.lua
reapack.desc: AUDIOBOOKS Chapter Marker Add/Edit 'CHAP=' markers for Audiobooks, adding a SideCar.TXT file

version.author: Tormy Van Cool
version.changelog: Created a SideCar.TXT file, Clicking on a preexistent Marker, it's possibile to edit it. The SideCar will be also updated.

version.author: Tormy Van Cool
version.changelog: Changed marker format into: CHAP=seconds_from_the_beginning_of_the_file|chapter_title. The SideCar.txt file, reports now in this way: seconds_from_the_beginning_of_the_file,1,"chapter_title" The ',1,' is added for compatibility with certain radio automation softwares, not capable to fully read MP3s

reapack.name: TormyVanCool_ChapterMarkersUpdater.lua
reapack.desc: AUDIOBOOKS Chapter Marker Updater: Updates markers' position when moved on the time line, on the SideCar.txt file
